command.text: declare @unitName nvarchar(1023) select @unitName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_dvcs else ten_dvcs2 end from dmdvcs where ma_dvcs = @@unit select 'this._unitCode=''' + @@unit + ''';this._unitName=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@unitName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';init$FormDepartment(this);active$FormDepartment(this);' as message return

declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$unitConflict nvarchar(512), @$parentConflict nvarchar(512), @$changeConflict nvarchar(512), @$childConflict nvarchar(512), @$updateConflict nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512), @$deleteConflict nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã bộ phận %s đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục bộ phận.' else N'The department %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$unitConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đơn vị cơ sở không hợp lệ.' else N'Invalid Unit.' end select @$parentConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Bộ phận mẹ không hợp lệ.' else N'Invalid Parent Department.' end select @$changeConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Bộ phận đã có bộ phận con, không sửa bộ phận mẹ được.' else N'Cannot save the parent department. This item has already been used.' end select @$childConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Bộ phận %s đã có bộ phận con, không sửa bộ phận được.' else N'Cannot save the department %s. This item has already been used.' end select @$updateConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã bộ phận %s đã phát sinh, không thể sửa được.' else N'Cannot edit the department %s. It has already been used.' end select @$deleteConflict = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã bộ phận %s đã phát sinh, không thể xóa được.' else N'Cannot delete the department %s. It has already been used.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã bộ phận %s đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The department %s has been modified or deleted by another user.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end
if @bp_me <> '' begin if @ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from @@table where ma_bp = @bp_me) begin select 'ma_dvcs' as field, @$unitConflict as message return end end select @bac_bp = case when @bp_me = '' then 1 else isnull((select bac_bp from @@table where ma_bp = @bp_me), 0) + 1 end &WhenDepartmentInserting; select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if @@language = 'v' select space(2 * (case when @bac_bp > 0 then @bac_bp - 1 else 0 end)) + case @@language when 'v' then @ten_bp else @ten_bp2 end as ten else select space(2 * (case when @bac_bp > 0 then @bac_bp - 1 else 0 end)) + case @@language when 'v' then @ten_bp else @ten_bp2 end as ten2

if not exists(select * from @@table where ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim($ma_bp.OldValue)) as message return end
if @ma_bp <> $ma_bp.OldValue begin if exists(select * from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp and ma_bp <> $ma_bp.OldValue) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) as message return end if exists(select 1 from @@table where bp_me = $ma_bp.OldValue) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$childConflict, '%s', rtrim($ma_bp.OldValue)) as message return end if exists(select * from hrnv where bp_ref in (select bp_ref from @@table where ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue)) begin select 'ma_bp' as field, replace(@$updateConflict, '%s', rtrim($ma_bp.OldValue)) as message return end end
if @bp_me <> '' begin if @ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from @@table where ma_bp = @bp_me) begin select 'ma_dvcs' as field, @$unitConflict as message return end end
if exists(select 1 from @@table where bp_me <> @bp_me and ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue) begin declare @oldParentDept varchar(32) select @oldParentDept = bp_me from @@table where ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue if exists(select 1 from @@table where bp_me = $ma_bp.OldValue) begin select 'bp_me' as field, @$changeConflict as message return end end declare @bac_bp int select @bac_bp = case when @bp_me = '' then 1 else isnull((select bac_bp from @@table where ma_bp = @bp_me), 0) + 1 end &WhenDepartmentUpdating;

update @@table set bac_bp = @bac_bp, datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ma_bp = @ma_bp if @@language = 'v' select space(2 * (case when @bac_bp > 0 then @bac_bp - 1 else 0 end)) + case @@language when 'v' then @ten_bp else @ten_bp2 end as ten else select space(2 * (case when @bac_bp > 0 then @bac_bp - 1 else 0 end)) + case @@language when 'v' then @ten_bp else @ten_bp2 end as ten2

declare @message nvarchar(255), @bp_ref varchar(128), @deptID varchar(32) select @message = replace(@$deleteConflict, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)) if exists(select 1 from @@table where bp_me = @ma_bp) or exists(select * from hrnv where bp_ref in (select bp_ref from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp)) begin select @message as message return end select @deptID = rtrim(ltrim(@ma_bp)), @bp_ref = bp_ref from @@table where ma_bp = @ma_bp

declare @c varchar(1) select @c = ','
select ma_quyen, r_access, r_access2 into #r1 from @@sysDatabaseName..hrctquyenbp where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(@bp_ref, r_access2) = 1 if exists(select 1 from #r1) begin update #r1 set r_access = replace(@c + r_access + @c, @c + @deptID + @c, @c), r_access2 = replace(@c + r_access2 + @c, @c + @bp_ref + @c, @c) update #r1 set r_access = '' where rtrim(ltrim(r_access)) = @c update #r1 set r_access2 = '' where rtrim(ltrim(r_access2)) = @c update #r1 set r_access = substring(r_access, 2, len(r_access) - 2) where r_access <> '' update #r1 set r_access2 = substring(r_access2, 2, len(r_access2) - 2) where r_access2 <> '' update @@sysDatabaseName..hrctquyenbp set r_access = b.r_access, r_access2 = b.r_access2 from @@sysDatabaseName..hrctquyenbp a join #r1 b on a.ma_quyen = b.ma_quyen end
select user_id, r_access, r_access2 into #r2 from @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(@bp_ref, r_access2) = 1 if exists(select 1 from #r2) begin update #r2 set r_access = replace(@c + r_access + @c, @c + @deptID + @c, @c), r_access2 = replace(@c + r_access2 + @c, @c + @bp_ref + @c, @c) update #r2 set r_access = '' where rtrim(ltrim(r_access)) = @c update #r2 set r_access2 = '' where rtrim(ltrim(r_access2)) = @c update #r2 set r_access = substring(r_access, 2, len(r_access) - 2) where r_access <> '' update #r2 set r_access2 = substring(r_access2, 2, len(r_access2) - 2) where r_access2 <> '' update @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp set r_access = b.r_access, r_access2 = b.r_access2 from @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp a join #r2 b on a.user_id = b.user_id end

action.text: if exists(select 1 from hrbp where ma_bp = @bp_me) begin select ma_dvcs, case when @@language = 'v' then ten_dvcs else ten_dvcs2 end from dmdvcs where ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from hrbp where ma_bp = @bp_me) return end
